title: Cheap TV deals at Amazon: Fire TVs starting at just $109.99
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Save up to $100 on smart TV deals at Amazon
article: If you're looking to pick up a cheap TV deal this weekend, then you're in luck. For the first time since Prime Day, Amazon is discounting a slew of Fire TVs from brands like Insignia and Toshiba that start at just $109.99.

All of Amazon's cheap TV deals include the Fire TV experience, which allows you to stream movies and TV shows from apps like Netflix, Disney Plus, Prime Video, and more. The Fire TVs also feature a handy voice remote with Amazon Alexa so you can use your voice to launch apps, search for titles, play music, and control compatible smart home devices. We've listed the best Fire TV deals from Amazon below but keep in mind, these are limited-time offers, so if you see a price you like, we recommend taking advantage now before it's too late.
